name: BlockStore
description:
BlockStore is a casual game that should relax you, in it you will be neither a sculptor nor an archaeologist, you have to hollow out various things from the stone.

Visual style.

The visual style of BlockStore consists of cubes - voxels, but things made of cubes look amazing due to the small color noise on their surface, as well as the use of modern post-processing tools.

Gameplay.

At the moment, the gameplay consists of systematically breaking cubes, but if I see the interest of the players in the game, then I will expand the functionality with such modes as: complete disassembly, assembly, free construction, craft. I will give the game development and much more.

Future of the project:

At the moment this project is not my main project (Its only experiment), but if suddenly you are interested in it, then please leave a comment about it below, this will let me know that you are not indifferent to the game and then I will finish it and it will appear on Steam.
